53 class CircleCentroids
54 {
55 public:
56  ros::NodeHandle n_;
57  ros::Subscriber lms1Centroid_subscriber;
58  ros::Subscriber lms2Centroid_subscriber;
59  ros::Subscriber ldmrsCentroid_subscriber;
60  ros::Subscriber swissrangerCentroid_subscriber;
61  ros::Subscriber cam1Centroid_subscriber;
62  geometry_msgs::PointStamped lms1Centroid;
63  geometry_msgs::PointStamped lms2Centroid;
64  geometry_msgs::PointStamped ldmrsCentroid;
65  geometry_msgs::PointStamped swissrangerCentroid;
66  geometry_msgs::PointStamped cam1Centroid;
71  CircleCentroids()
72  {
73  //Topics I want to subscribe
74  lms1Centroid_subscriber=n_.subscribe("/laser1/sphereCentroid", 1000, &CircleCentroids::lms1CentroidUpdate, this);
75  lms2Centroid_subscriber=n_.subscribe("/laser2/sphereCentroid", 1000, &CircleCentroids::lms2CentroidUpdate, this);
76  ldmrsCentroid_subscriber=n_.subscribe("/sphere_centroid", 1000, &CircleCentroids::ldmrsCentroidUpdate, this);
77  swissrangerCentroid_subscriber=n_.subscribe("/swissranger/spherecenter", 1000, &CircleCentroids::swissrangerCentroidUpdate, this);
78  cam1Centroid_subscriber=n_.subscribe("/Camera1/ballCentroid",1000, &CircleCentroids::cam1CentroidUpdate, this);
79  }
80 
81  ~CircleCentroids(){}
82 
83  void lms1CentroidUpdate(const geometry_msgs::PointStamped& msg)
84  {
85  lms1Centroid=msg;
86  }
87 
88  void lms2CentroidUpdate(const geometry_msgs::PointStamped& msg)
89  {
90  lms2Centroid=msg;
91  }
92

94  {

96  }

99  {
100  swissrangerCentroid=msg;
101  }
102 
103  void cam1CentroidUpdate(const geometry_msgs::PointStamped& msg)
104  {
105  cam1Centroid=msg;
106  }
